title.en: A Story About Being Targeted by an Armed JK

altTitles.pt-br: Uma História Sobre Ser Alvo de uma Jk Armada
Uma História Sobre Ser Alvo de uma Colegial Armado

description.en: Possibly a side story of [A Story About Being Attacked by an Armed JK](https://mangadex.org/title/381f1c5e-d1b2-421d-9358-840187c7d99a/a-story-about-being-attacked-by-an-armed-jk). The author has never really said.

biography.en:
Web comic artist. Not to be confused with the non-fiction author of the same name [Kazuki (kazuki5)](https://mangadex.org/author/fed01cb9-9038-4b4e-a26e-0748f69146ab), the mangaka [Kazuki (カズキ)](https://mangadex.org/author/7741cf13-7946-42b8-8d0f-84a4d63ff481), the het H-manga artist [Kazuki (かづき)](https://mangadex.org/author/867695db-f1ba-40a2-9743-3b8de2820fac), or the BL doujin artist [Kazuki (架月)](https://mangadex.org/author/848d178b-4d69-4cf2-adc7-e37d67f3e6e7).

**Native name**: かずき

**Alt. names**:
ka3uki
